mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wj_board_worship (created_user_idx, category, worship_type, worship_date, title, verse, host_name, content, created_date, updated_date) VALUES ( #{user_idx}, #{category}, #{worship_type}, #{date}, #{title}, #{verse}, #{host_name}, #{content}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE wj_board_worship SET category = #{category}, worship_type = #{worship_type}, worship_date = #{date}, title = #{title}, verse = #{verse}, host_name = #{host_name}, content = #{content}, updated_date = now() WHERE board_idx = #{board_idx}
UPDATE wj_board_worship SET is_deleted = true, updated_date = now() WHERE board_idx = #{board_idx}
mapper.select: SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS board_idx, category, created_user_idx, DATE_FORMAT(worship_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as date, worship_type, host_name, title, verse, content, (created_user_idx = #{my_user_idx}) as is_mine, DATE_FORMAT(created_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') as created_date, DATE_FORMAT(updated_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') as updated_date FROM wj_board_worship WHERE is_deleted is NOT TRUE ${query} ORDER BY worship_date desc, worship_type desc LIMIT #{start}, #{cnt}

SELECT board_idx, category, created_user_idx, DATE_FORMAT(worship_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as date, worship_type, host_name, title, verse, content, (created_user_idx = #{my_user_idx}) as is_mine, DATE_FORMAT(created_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') as created_date, DATE_FORMAT(updated_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') as updated_date FROM wj_board_worship WHERE is_deleted is NOT TRUE AND board_idx = #{board_idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wj_board (created_user_idx, category, title, content, created_date, updated_date, is_deleted) VALUES ( #{user_idx}, #{category}, #{title}, #{content}, now(), now(), false )

INSERT INTO board_files (board_idx, file_type, aws_file_name, origin_file_name, ord, url, thumb_url, created_date, is_deleted) VALUE (#{board_idx}, #{file_type}, #{aws_file_name}, #{origin_file_name}, #{ord}, #{url} ,#{thumb_url}, now(), false)
mapper.update: UPDATE wj_board board left join board_files files ON board.board_idx = files.board_idx SET board.is_deleted = true, files.is_deleted = true, board.updated_date = now() WHERE board.board_idx = #{board_idx}
mapper.select:
SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS board.board_idx, category, created_user_idx, title, content, (created_user_idx = #{my_user_idx}) as is_mine, DATE_FORMAT(created_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as date, DATE_FORMAT(created_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') as created_date, DATE_FORMAT(updated_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') as updated_date, (SELECT url FROM board_files WHERE board_idx = board.board_idx AND ord = -1) as thumb_url, (select url from board_files where board_idx = board.board_idx AND is_deleted is not TRUE order by idx limit 1) as thumb FROM wj_board board
WHERE board.is_deleted is NOT TRUE ${query} ORDER BY board.created_date desc LIMIT #{start}, #{cnt}

SELECT board.board_idx, category, created_user_idx, title, content, (created_user_idx = #{my_user_idx}) as is_mine, DATE_FORMAT(board.created_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') as created_date, DATE_FORMAT(board.updated_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') as updated_date FROM wj_board board WHERE board.is_deleted is NOT TRUE AND board.board_idx = #{board_idx}
SELECT * FROM board_files WHERE board_idx = #{board_idx} AND is_deleted is not true and ord >= 0 ORDER BY ord
